question: Which Indian bank has launched a pre-paid card called ‘Enkasu’, which can be used both online and offline?
explanation:
Tamil Nadu-based Karur Vysya Bank has launched a pre-paid card called ‘Enkasu’, which can be used both online and offline, in Karur district of the state.
The card aims to reduce the usage of cash in the district of Karur. The cardholder can make tap & go payments for all small purchases to merchants for a minimum of Re. 1/-. The card can be recharged through their mobile App \'DLite\', UPI, NEFT or through any of their branches. The cards are given to both customers and non-customers after KYC verification.
